name: Vera Blanc: Ghost in the Castle
name_original: Vera Blanc: Ghost in the Castle
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young woman with the ability to read other people's minds. The game is a mixture of visual novel and adventure game with a collection of challenging minigames, you can also play as a pure visual novel. In this episode, our heroine travels to a small village in central Italy.

The town's legendary ghost seems like nothing more than a quaint story, but a string of murders and suicides all point to the castle's ghost, and locals are getting scared.

Will you be able to solve the mystery?

Features
* Visual novel with multiple endings
* Solve a mystery
* Variety of minigames (you can also play without them)
* Comic book inspired art style


Offline single player
